title: Disclaimer
description: Educational content only — not medical advice.
main_html:
If you only read one thing:

Before contacting any provider, make sure you understand what is being offered, how credentials are verified, and what questions you need answered in writing.

Disclaimer

Disclaimer

Educational content only — not medical advice.

The Dentistry Guides provides general educational information. It does not provide medical or dental advice and does not create a provider–patient relationship.

Always consult a licensed dental professional for diagnosis and treatment decisions. In emergencies, call local emergency services.

We do not rank or endorse providers. Advertising placements are clearly labeled and do not influence editorial content.

Why this matters: clarifying expectations early reduces misunderstandings, delays, and unnecessary costs later.
